short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension to help making healthier food purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avocadoo automatically reads and analyzes your shopping cart when you shop online, and provides feedback: nutritional value of the cart, allergies, recipes...

Avocadoo is a 100% free service, does not rely on any advertisement, and is malware free. Just enjoy :)

== Why does Avocadoo need permission to "access data on all websites"? == 

This permission is needed by Avocadoo for its basic functionality to detect compatible websites and prevent unnecessary calls to our server. Avocadoo **DOES NOT** collect any of your data or your browsing activity on any websites others than the compatible ones. Collected data on compatible websites are only the minimum needed for our API to work and are not shared with any third party. We are pretty fanatical about privacy ourselves, and your privacy is extremely important to us. Please visit this page for more info - https://avocadoo.com/privacy
